title: Language Access Month
context: [ยง8-20] Language Access Month. The month of August shall be known and designated as &ldquo;Language Access Month&rdquo; to promote awareness of language access for government services and emphasize the importance of and need for language access in Hawaii&rsquo;s diverse society. This month is not and shall not be construed as a state holiday. [L 2009, c 69, ยง2]
